parameters.name: override_date
parameters.description: today's date is encoded in data folder: add to a previous folder by specifying it here (yyyy-mm-dd)
parameters.help_text: today's date is encoded in data folder: add to a previous folder by specifying it here (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: default_qc_only
parameters.description: only use units with default_qc == True

parameters.name: align_to_col
parameters.description: column in trials table to align PSTHs to (pre and post will determine total window)

parameters.name: pre
parameters.description: length of time, in seconds, to capture before the event in `align_to`
parameters.help_text: length of time, in seconds, to capture before the event in `align_to`

parameters.name: post
parameters.description: length of time, in seconds, to capture after the event in `align_to`
parameters.help_text: length of time, in seconds, to capture after the event in `align_to`

parameters.name: as_spike_count
parameters.description: save number of spikes in [pre:post] window
parameters.help_text: save number of spikes in [pre:post] window

parameters.name: as_binarized_array
parameters.description: save presence/absence of spikes in bins, rather than spike times
parameters.help_text: save presence/absence of spikes in bins, rather than spike times

parameters.name: bin_size_s
parameters.description: bin size for binarized_array (has no effect if as_binarized_array == False)
parameters.help_text: bin size for binarized_array (has no effect if as_binarized_array == False)

parameters.name: largest_to_smallest
parameters.description: Reverse processing order (default is smallest -> largest areas)
parameters.help_text: Reverse processing order (default is smallest -> largest areas)
